title: JAAL 1.1 graph
description: A graph data structure for representing lists, trees, and graphs.

id.description: A unique identifier for the graph among all data structures.

node.description: List of nodes in the graph.

edge.description: List of edges in the graph.

dsClass.description: A keyword describing the main interpretation of the graph

dsSubClass.description: A free keyword descriping the detailed interpretation of the graph.

legend.description: A text to be displayed on the top of the graph.

style.description: Graphical style of the node: a name of a style definition.
